text: Ana nehu'za zamagra ne'mofa'zamia zamahe'za tevefi Kresramana nevu'za, zamene vahete'ene, fri vahe hankro'enema keaga nehaza vahetega, zamaza hanazegu nevu'za, Israeli vahe'mo'za Ra Anumzamofo avurera monko a'nemo'zama nehazaza hu'za zamagra'a zagore ome atre'za havi zamavu'zmavaza hazazamo Anumzamofona azeri arimpa ahe'ne.
